Text: Do you need CFW 3.55 to play this or do you just install it to your HD and play?

You need to merge the spilt media files if you want to play this from the internal HDD. Trying to load it just as it is will make your PS3 freeze.
Works fine otherwise, cheers.

@McCore24 - Yeah you just install it to your PS3... Sony hates making money, so they just let you download games and install them at your will.
